reviewText: I have never seen this video, so I admit that I don't really know anything about what it is like, but I just want to point this out: the famous VHS tape titled "King: Montgomery to Memphis" has a run time of 103 minutes.  The DVD being offered here has a run time of only 27 minutes.  So, if you are looking for the information on the famous VHS tape, as I am, it is not all here.
